thread.title: BRIEF-Frontfour Capital Group Llc & Affiliates says Determined To Withdraw Its Slate Of Nominees For Election To Board Of Directors Of ILG Inc At Annual Meeting

title: BRIEF-Frontfour Capital Group Llc & Affiliates says Determined To Withdraw Its Slate Of Nominees For Election To Board Of Directors Of ILG Inc At Annual Meeting

organizations.name: ilg inc at annual meeting reuters

text:
Market News May 1, 2018 / 7:52 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Frontfour Capital Group Llc & Affiliates says Determined To Withdraw Its Slate Of Nominees For Election To Board Of Directors Of ILG Inc At Annual Meeting Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 1 (Reuters) - Frontfour Capital Group Llc & Affiliates
* FRONTFOUR CAPITAL GROUP LLC & AFFILIATES-DETERMINED TO WITHDRAW ITS SLATE OF NOMINEES FOR ELECTION TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF ILG INC AT ANNUAL MEETING
* FRONTFOUR CAPITAL GROUP LLC & AFFILIATES- SUPPORTS THE ACQUISITION OF ILG BY MARRIOTT VACATIONS Source text - bit.ly/2FzoQPY Further company coverage:
